TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_Bruce_Bowen, title = Bruce_Bowen, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bruce_Bowen} }

S.FORM: Bruce Bowen nalecuhan i Merced, California, nanu syubay kanas-mali miunduay nu Amilika NBA nisakaput, pahanhanan tu kawaw ayza. 6 bulad 14 demiad, 1971 a mihca, Bruce Bowen, miunduay.
Broce Bowen nalecohan i Merced, California, nano syobay kanas-mali miondoay no Amilika NBA nisakapot, pahanhanan to kawaw ayza. 6 bolad 14 demiad, 1971 a mihca, Broce Bowen, miondoay.
